aircraft.value: Thunderhawk X-12 - AC-8759-966 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Actuator seal leakage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Utility Hydraulics component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 07/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 08/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 12/12/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 11/12/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 13/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
